Class ServiceFailureException

java.lang.Object

                  org.mindswap.exceptions.ServiceFailureException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ServiceFailureException
extends HealableExecutionException

Thrown if invocation of a service failed (because it is offline or crashed) or if the service returned an error.

See Also:
